item.title: Go Ahead—Make the Big Ask
item.description: The worst that happens is they say “no.”

item.title: Here’s How You Can Help Your Employees With Financial Emergencies
item.description: When money is tight, an emergency expense can upend an someone’s life. Offering this simple benefit can help soften the impact.

item.title: My Employee Calls in Sick After Negative Feedback
item.description: He seems like he’s in a tailspin.

item.title: Science Says Marry the Right Person and You’ll Be More Successful, Except for 1 (Very Personal) Catch
item.description: Research shows the person you marry makes a huge difference where career, wealth, and health are concerned. But so does the person they marry.

item.title: Where Are the Flying Cars? It Turns Out They’re Here, Delivering Ice Cream for Walmart
item.description: The flying vehicles are here. They’re just unmanned. And last week, Walmart made it official.
